ERP Solutions for the Food Chain

Farm to Home, Faster

Our goal is to move the food you produce or ship faster to the plate. Fresher food means happier customers.

Learn More

Improved SCM Visibility

By using our SCM or our consultancy, we can help you improve communication between different supply chain actors.

Learn More

Lesser Wastage

By increasing the supply chain visibility, we can improve the speed of shipment of fresh produce, therefore reducing produce wastage and time.

Learn More

Our Product Features

Our SaaS includes:

  • Supply chain transparency
  • GS1 compatible
  • Produce pick-up and distribution scheduling and alerts management
  • IoT with sensors integration (temperature, humidity, etc...)
  • On the cloud, meaning minimal IT management for you
  • Road condition monitoring and route suggestions
  • GIS analytics
  • HR management
  • Finance management
  • And more!

With our SaaS platform targeted toward user in the food chain, you can improve the tracking and mangement of your produce over multiple depots and fleet options. Other feautres include weather monitoring, road and traffic conditions, and real-time commodity environment monitoring.

Currently, our product is in development and field testing. Please contact us if you are interested.
